short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a new word by opening a new tab
short.ru: Узнавай новые слова, открывая новую вкладку

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An effective way to start learning a language by learning the most common words. This app helps you master these top words and accelerate your progress towards speaking and understanding a new foreign language.
